dcterms:creator: I. Serban
A. Sordoni
Y. Bengio
A. Courville
J. Pineau
dcterms:description: The Movie Triples dataset spans a wide range of topics with few spelling mistakes and contains about 240,000 dialogue triples, making it suitable for studying the relevance-diversity tradeoff in multi-turn conversations.
dcterms:title: Movie Triples

dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
N. Pow
I. Serban
J. Pineau
dcterms:description: The Ubuntu Dialogue dataset, extracted from the Ubuntu Relay Chat Channel, contains about 1.85 million conversations with an average of 5 utterances per conversation, ideal for training dialogue models that can provide expert knowledge/recommendation in domain-specific conversations.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue
